actions.text: Amendment SA 438 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 54.

Amendment SA 438 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Shaheen. (consideration: CR S2130-2134; text: CR S2131) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect women's access to health care, including primary and preventative health care, family planning and birth control, and employer-provided contraceptive coverage, such as was provided under the Affordable Care Act (PL 111-148).
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 438 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 54.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 438 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 56 - 43. Record Vote Number: 54.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 438 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Shaheen.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect women's access to health care, including primary and preventative health care, family planning and birth control, and employer-provided contraceptive coverage, such as was provided under the Affordable Care Act (PL 111-148).
